filterTemplateItem

Summary
A single item within a filter template. For example city=Denver.


Fields
Name Type Attributes Description
attributeCode  name
max length: 50
allows printable 		required
  		Identify a specific attribute within the template.  
auditLogTitle  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		This is used a the title in auditLogs. This should NEVER be null.  
createdLocalDate  date abstract
  		The created date based on the user's local timezone.  
createdLocalTime  time abstract
  		The created time of day based on the user's local timezone.  
createdLocalTs  timestamp abstract
  		The created timestamp converted to the user's local timezone.  
createdLocalTsMessage  text100
max length: 100
allows printable 		abstract
  		The created timestamp converted to the user's local timezone, and formatted as a string that includes the timezone code.  
createdUtcTs  timestamp required
audit disabled   		The time this record was originally created.  
domainSubtitle  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		The subtitle commonly used for rows in a list. This MAY be null, if there is not subtitle.  
domainTitle  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		The title commonly used for rows in a list or dropdown field. This should NEVER be null.  
lockVersion  lockVersion required
audit disabled   		This is used to coordinate optimistic locking in the database. This is usually not displayed.  
uid  uid
max length: 30
allows printable 		primary key
required
  		The global unique key. This is a large hex-encoded number, and is usually not displayed to users. This is currently NOT a standard format, but is instead a format that we use internally.  
updatedLocalDate  date abstract
  		The updated date based on the user's local timezone.  
updatedLocalTime  time abstract
  		The updated time of day based on the user's local timezone.  
updatedLocalTs  timestamp abstract
  		The updated timestamp converted to the user's local timezone.  
updatedLocalTsMessage  text100
max length: 100
allows printable 		abstract
  		The updated timestamp converted to the user's local timezone, and formatted as a string that includes the timezone code.  
updatedUtcTs  timestamp required
audit disabled   		The time this record was last updated.  
used  boolean required
  		Indicates if this item is used in the filter. Setting this to true/false is simpler than inserting/deleting the entire record.  
value  text100
max length: 100
allows printable 		  The encoded value for this item. The value is always stored as a string, and the format will vary depending on the type of value being stored.  


Associations
Name Type Attributes Description
createdBy  user audit disabled   The user that originally created this record, if known.  
template  filterTemplate required
  		The template that contains this item.  
updatedBy  user audit disabled   The user that last updated this record, if known.
